typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{OETireSize } as string,
		LoadRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['SCD1','SCD1_Backup']) ~> OELoadRange
source(output(
		OETireSize as integer,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
OELoadRange, source1 exists({OETireSize } == toString(OETireSize),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> TireiSizenotexist
TireiSizenotexist derive(Updated_Date = currentDate(),
		Inserted_Date = currentDate(),
		OETireSize = toInteger({OETireSize })) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		OETireSize as integer,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		OETireSize,
		LoadRange,
		Updated_Date,
		Inserted_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
